SqlMap.sql: select t.idx as "idx", t.trainTypeIdx as "trainTypeIdx", t.trainType as "trainType", t.trainNo as "trainNo", t.beforeFxDate as "beforeFxDate", t.nextFxDate as "nextFxDate", t.beforeDxDate as "beforeDxDate", t.nextDxDate as "nextDxDate", t.beforeCxDate as "beforeCxDate", t.nextCxDate as "nextCxDate", t.leaveDate as "leaveDate" from ( select hc.idx as idx, hc.train_type_idx as trainTypeIdx, hc.train_type as trainType, hc.train_no as trainNo, hc.before_fx_date as beforeFxDate, case when fx.max_running_km is not null then to_char((hc.before_fx_date + fx.max_running_km),'yyyy-MM') else '' end nextFxDate, hc.before_dx_date as beforeDxDate, case when dx.max_running_km is not null then to_char((hc.before_dx_date + dx.max_running_km),'yyyy-MM') else '' end nextDxDate, hc.before_cx_date as beforeCxDate, case when cx.max_running_km is not null then to_char((hc.before_cx_date + cx.max_running_km),'yyyy-MM') else '' end nextCxDate, to_char(info.leave_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') as leaveDate from K_REPAIR_WARNING_HC hc inner join JCZL_TRAIN info on info.train_type_idx = hc.train_type_idx and info.train_no = hc.train_no left join ( select * from JCJX_REPAIR_STANDARD rs where rs.repair_class = '30' and rs.repair_order = '10' ) fx on fx.train_type_idx = hc.train_type_idx left join ( select * from JCJX_REPAIR_STANDARD rs where rs.repair_class = '20' and rs.repair_order = '10' ) dx on dx.train_type_idx = hc.train_type_idx left join ( select * from JCJX_REPAIR_STANDARD rs where rs.repair_class = '10' and rs.repair_order = '10' ) cx on cx.train_type_idx = hc.train_type_idx ) t where 1=1

select kc.idx as "idx", kc.train_type_idx as "trainTypeIdx", kc.train_type as "trainType", kc.train_no as "trainNo", kc.a1_km as "a1km", kc.a2_km as "a2km", kc.a3_km as "a3km", kc.a4_km as "a4km", kc.a5_km as "a5km", to_char(kc.before_a1_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') as "beforeA1Date", to_char(kc.before_a2_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') as "beforeA2Date", to_char(kc.before_a3_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') as "beforeA3Date", to_char(kc.before_a4_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') as "beforeA4Date", to_char(kc.before_a5_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') as "beforeA5Date", nvl(to_char(kc.next_a1_date,'yyyy-MM-dd'),'') as "nextA1Date", nvl(to_char(kc.next_a2_date,'yyyy-MM'),'') as "nextA2Date", nvl(to_char(kc.next_a3_date,'yyyy-MM'),'') as "nextA3Date", nvl(to_char(kc.next_a4_date,'yyyy-MM'),'') as "nextA4Date", nvl(to_char(kc.next_a5_date,'yyyy-MM'),'') as "nextA5Date", kc.repair_class as "repairClass", kc.repair_class_name as "repairClassName", kc.repair_warning_type as "repairWarningType", kc.total_km as "totalkm", kc.remark as "remark", to_char(info.leave_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') as "leaveDate" from K_REPAIR_WARNING_KC kc inner join JCZL_TRAIN info on info.train_type_idx = kc.train_type_idx and info.train_no = kc.train_no left join ( select * from JCJX_REPAIR_STANDARD rs where rs.repair_class = '50' and rs.repair_order = '10' ) a1 on a1.train_type_idx = kc.train_type_idx left join ( select * from JCJX_REPAIR_STANDARD rs where rs.repair_class = '60' and rs.repair_order = '10' ) a2 on a2.train_type_idx = kc.train_type_idx left join ( select * from JCJX_REPAIR_STANDARD rs where rs.repair_class = '70' and rs.repair_order = '10' ) a3 on a3.train_type_idx = kc.train_type_idx left join ( select * from JCJX_REPAIR_STANDARD rs where rs.repair_class = '80' and rs.repair_order = '10' ) a4 on a4.train_type_idx = kc.train_type_idx left join ( select * from JCJX_REPAIR_STANDARD rs where rs.repair_class = '90' and rs.repair_order = '10' ) a5 on a5.train_type_idx = kc.train_type_idx where 1=1

select d.idx as "idx", d.plan_idx as "planIdx", d.train_type_idx as "trainTypeIdx", d.train_type_shortname as "trainTypeShortName", d.plan_count as "planCount", zx.zxcounts as "zxcounts", xj.xjcounts as "xjcounts" from SCDD_TRAIN_ENFORCE_PLAN_HC p left join SCDD_TRAIN_ENFORCE_DETAIL_HC d on p.idx = d.plan_idx left join ( select wp.train_type_idx , wp.train_type_shortname , to_char(wp.begin_time,'yyyy') as wpYear, to_number(to_char(wp.begin_time,'MM')) as wpMonth, count(1) as zxcounts from JXGC_Train_Work_Plan wp where wp.record_status = 0 and wp.t_vehicle_type = '10' and wp.work_plan_status = 'ONGOING' group by wp.train_type_idx , wp.train_type_shortname , to_char(wp.begin_time,'yyyy'),to_number(to_char(wp.begin_time,'MM')) ) zx on zx.wpYear = p.plan_year and zx.wpMonth = p.plan_morth and zx.train_type_idx = d.train_type_idx left join ( select wp.train_type_idx , wp.train_type_shortname , to_char(wp.begin_time,'yyyy') as wpYear, to_number(to_char(wp.begin_time,'MM')) as wpMonth, count(1) as xjcounts from JXGC_Train_Work_Plan wp where wp.record_status = 0 and wp.t_vehicle_type = '10' and wp.work_plan_status = 'COMPLETE' group by wp.train_type_idx , wp.train_type_shortname , to_char(wp.begin_time,'yyyy'),to_number(to_char(wp.begin_time,'MM')) ) xj on xj.wpYear = p.plan_year and xj.wpMonth = p.plan_morth and xj.train_type_idx = d.train_type_idx where p.record_status = 0 and d.record_status = 0

select t.idx as "idx", t.marshalling_code as "marshallingCode", t.marshalling_name as "marshallingName", t.train_count as "trainCount", d.idx as "demandIdx", d.strips as "strips", d.back_strips as "backStrips", d.strips || '/' || d.back_strips as "stripsAll", d.starting_station as "startingStation", d.leave_off_station as "leaveOffStation", d.starting_station || '-' || d.leave_off_station as "stationAll", d.departure_time as "departureTime", d.arrival_time as "arrivalTime" , d.departure_time || '~' || d.arrival_time as "toTimeAll", d.departure_back_time as "departureBackTime", d.arrival_back_time as "arrivalBackTime", d.departure_back_time || '~' || d.arrival_back_time as "arrivalTimeAll", d.train_inspector_name as "trainInspectorName", to_char(d.running_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') as "runningDate" from K_MARSHALLING t left join K_TRAIN_DEMAND d on d.record_status = 0 and d.marshalling_idx = t.idx and to_char(d.running_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') where t.record_status = 0

select info.idx as "idx", info.train_type_idx as "trainTypeIdx", info.train_type_shortname as "trainTypeShortname", info.train_no as "trainNo", info.make_factory_name as "makeFactoryName", info.register_person_name as "registerPersonName", info.train_state as "trainState", kc.a1_km as "a1km", kc.a2_km as "a2km", kc.a3_km as "a3km", kc.a4_km as "a4km", kc.a5_km as "a5km", nvl(to_char(kc.before_a1_date,'yyyy-MM-dd'),'') as "beforeA1Date", nvl(to_char(kc.before_a2_date,'yyyy-MM'),'') as "beforeA2Date", nvl(to_char(kc.before_a3_date,'yyyy-MM'),'') as "beforeA3Date", nvl(to_char(kc.before_a4_date,'yyyy-MM'),'') as "beforeA4Date", nvl(to_char(kc.before_a5_date,'yyyy-MM'),'') as "beforeA5Date", nvl(to_char(kc.next_a1_date,'yyyy-MM-dd'),'') as "nextA1Date", nvl(to_char(kc.next_a2_date,'yyyy-MM'),'') as "nextA2Date", nvl(to_char(kc.next_a3_date,'yyyy-MM'),'') as "nextA3Date", nvl(to_char(kc.next_a4_date,'yyyy-MM'),'') as "nextA4Date", nvl(to_char(kc.next_a5_date,'yyyy-MM'),'') as "nextA5Date", kc.repair_class as "repairClass", kc.repair_class_name as "repairClassName", kc.total_km as "totalkm", kc.remark as "remark", to_char(info.leave_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') as "leaveDate", mt.idx as "mtIdx", wp.idx as "workPlanIdx", case when wp.idx is not null then '50' when mt.idx is null then '40' end as "status"
from JCZL_TRAIN info left join K_REPAIR_WARNING_KC kc on info.train_type_idx = kc.train_type_idx and info.train_no = kc.train_no left join K_MARSHALLING_TRAIN mt on mt.train_type_idx = info.train_type_idx and mt.train_no = info.train_no and mt.record_status = 0 left join JXGC_Train_Work_Plan wp on wp.record_status = 0 and wp.t_vehicle_type = '20' and wp.work_plan_status = 'ONGOING' and wp.train_type_idx = info.train_type_idx and wp.train_no = info.train_no left join ( select * from JCJX_REPAIR_STANDARD rs where rs.repair_class = '50' and rs.repair_order = '10' ) a1 on a1.train_type_idx = kc.train_type_idx left join ( select * from JCJX_REPAIR_STANDARD rs where rs.repair_class = '60' and rs.repair_order = '10' ) a2 on a2.train_type_idx = kc.train_type_idx left join ( select * from JCJX_REPAIR_STANDARD rs where rs.repair_class = '70' and rs.repair_order = '10' ) a3 on a3.train_type_idx = kc.train_type_idx left join ( select * from JCJX_REPAIR_STANDARD rs where rs.repair_class = '80' and rs.repair_order = '10' ) a4 on a4.train_type_idx = kc.train_type_idx left join ( select * from JCJX_REPAIR_STANDARD rs where rs.repair_class = '90' and rs.repair_order = '10' ) a5 on a5.train_type_idx = kc.train_type_idx where 1=1 and info.record_status = 0 and info.t_vehicle_type = '20'

select info.idx as "idx", info.train_type_idx as "trainTypeIdx", info.train_type_shortname as "trainTypeShortname", info.train_no as "trainNo", info.make_factory_name as "makeFactoryName", info.register_person_name as "registerPersonName", info.train_state as "trainState", to_char(info.leave_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') as "leaveDate", trunc(sysdate) - trunc(info.leave_date) as "totalday", hc.before_fx_date as "beforeFxDate", case when fx.max_running_km is not null then to_char((hc.before_fx_date + fx.max_running_km),'yyyy-MM') else '' end "nextFxDate", hc.before_dx_date as "beforeDxDate", case when dx.max_running_km is not null then to_char((hc.before_dx_date + dx.max_running_km),'yyyy-MM') else '' end "nextDxDate", hc.before_cx_date as "beforeCxDate", case when cx.max_running_km is not null then to_char((hc.before_cx_date + cx.max_running_km),'yyyy-MM') else '' end "nextCxDate" from JCZL_TRAIN info left join K_REPAIR_WARNING_HC hc on info.train_type_idx = hc.train_type_idx and info.train_no = hc.train_no left join ( select * from JCJX_REPAIR_STANDARD rs where rs.repair_class = '30' and rs.repair_order = '10' ) fx on fx.train_type_idx = info.train_type_idx left join ( select * from JCJX_REPAIR_STANDARD rs where rs.repair_class = '20' and rs.repair_order = '10' ) dx on dx.train_type_idx = info.train_type_idx left join ( select * from JCJX_REPAIR_STANDARD rs where rs.repair_class = '10' and rs.repair_order = '10' ) cx on cx.train_type_idx = info.train_type_idx where 1=1 and info.record_status = 0 and info.t_vehicle_type = '10'
